result.title: Hello cooking freaks1!
result.content: Hello cooking frks i decided tht i want evrybody 2 find sth just 4 them on my blog, so ill giv u some best recipes frum my kitchn. Pls remember tht eggs=life so the bst option to make a great impression on your guests is making scrambled eggs from my recipe. First of all u hav to take eggs. Crack them in2 a pan. Dont use other pots cause u ll hav to wash them!!!! Fry eggs. Remove eggs on the plate. Add som luvage or sth totally different, dont forgt to add your soul!!! Now u r ready to win the Masterchef, no need to thank me im rlly happy when i see smile on ur faces so tht ll be the best reward u can giv me!! PEAS 'N' LUV SHARE UR PHOTOS OF SCRAMBLED EGGS FROM THS RECIPE!!!! XOXOXOXOX
